<resources> <string name="app_name">Logger</string> <string name="splash_title">Daily Standup</string> <string name="splash_subtitle">Keep your team in sync with daily updates and track progress effortlessly.</string> <string name="splash_get_started">Get Started</string> <string name="splash_configure_settings">Configure Settings</string> <string name="home">Home</string> <string name="submit">Submit</string> <string name="history">History</string> <string name="settings">Settings</string>
<string name="submit_standup_title">Submit Standup</string> <string name="submit_standup_subtitle">Share your progress with the team</string> <string name="name_label">Name</string> <string name="yesterday_label">What did you do yesterday?</string> <string name="today_label">What will you do today?</string> <string name="blockers_label_optional">Any blockers? (optional)</string> <string name="required_fields_missing">Please fill all required fields.</string> <string name="unknown_error">Something went wrong. Please try again.</string> <string name="cancel">Cancel</string> <string name="back">Back</string> <string name="submitted_title">Submitted!</string> <string name="submitted_message">Your standup was submitted at %1$s</string> <string name="dashboard">Dashboard</string> <string name="view_history">View History</string> <string name="confirm_next_actions_label">What would you like to do next?</string>
<string name="history_title">Standup History</string> <string name="history_subtitle">View past submissions</string> <string name="select_date_label">Select date</string> <string name="pick_date">Pick Date</string> <string name="history_empty_title">No standups</string> <string name="history_empty_subtitle">No submissions for this date</string>
<!-- Settings --> <string name="settings_title">Settings</string> <string name="settings_subtitle">App preferences</string> <string name="settings_team_roster">Team Roster</string> <string name="settings_manage_team">Manage team members</string> <string name="settings_notifications">Notifications</string> <string name="settings_push_label">Push notifications</string> <string name="settings_push_desc">Get reminders and updates</string> <string name="settings_email_label">Email notifications</string> <string name="settings_email_desc">Receive daily summaries</string>
